recently born: Breast-feeding is extremely beneficial to the health of newborn babies. Newborn infants, who have little immunity, are especially vulnerable to whooping cough.

used to refer to something that has recently been created or started to exist: This is not some kind of newborn liberalism. the newborn democracies of the world
